This is the album that got me into King Diamond. I'll be honest, for years I thought KD was kind of goofy, I'm not into his satanic stuff with Mercyful Fate, and I thought his falsetto voice was difficult to listen to. I never really gave his music much of a chance.

When I purchased this, I thought I was just getting a regular black vinyl, but to my surprise, it was a black a purple marble record. The Eye is the fifth studio album from danish Heavy metal Artist King Diamond, who previously was in the band Mercyful Fate. I love this album.
